com.cleo.lexicom.edi

Class EDI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cleo.lexicom.edi.EDI

  • public class EDI
extends java.lang.Object
    Parses an EDI file or stream (X12, EDIFACT, and TRADACOMS) into individual segments containing elements and subelements. Refer to EDIFilterInputStream.getEDI().

    • Field Summary

      Fields
